title: Gauss law - sphere with rho equals beta times r

content.question: A solid, charged, insulating sphere of radius <math alttext="uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> has a spherically symmetric charge distribution that varies as a function of the distance <math alttext="lowercase r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> from the sphere’s center.
